customer_name: William B Lee I I I

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 PM on
06/06/2014.
Licensee was reached by telephone but was not available to accompany APHIS personnel on the inspection.
